Sentencas: Herein, a micro-structured electrode design has been developed via a modified phase-inversion method.
Titulo: Electrode design for direct-methane micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (MT-SOFC)

Sentencas: A thin electrolyte integrated with a highly porous anode scaffold has been fabricated in a single-step process and developed into a complete fuel cell for direct methane (CH4) utilisation.
Titulo: Electrode design for direct-methane micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (MT-SOFC)

Sentencas: A continuous and well-dispersed layer of copper-ceria (Cu-CeO2) was incorporated inside the micro-channels of the anode scaffold.
Titulo: Electrode design for direct-methane micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (MT-SOFC)

Sentencas: A complete cell was investigated for direct CH4 utilisation.
Titulo: Electrode design for direct-methane micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (MT-SOFC)

Sentencas: The well-organised micro-channels and nano-structured Cu-CeO2 anode contributed to an increase in electrochemical reaction sites that promoted charge-transfer as well as facilitating gaseous fuel distribution, resulting in outstanding performances.
Titulo: Electrode design for direct-methane micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (MT-SOFC)

Sentencas: Excellent electrochemical performances have been achieved in both hydrogen (H-2) and CH4 operation.
Titulo: Electrode design for direct-methane micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (MT-SOFC)

Sentencas: The power density of 0.16 Wcm(-2) at 750 degrees C with dry CH4 as fuel is one of the highest ever reported values for similar anode materials.
Titulo: Electrode design for direct-methane micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (MT-SOFC)
